title: Review team/role/template flows end-to-end
details: Verify how teams, roles, and templates are created/assigned in UI and API, and document gaps in current UX and validations.

title: Expand team-role-template capabilities in UI
details: Add clearer role assignment UX, template defaults per role, and member-level overrides; ensure read-only for non-admins.

title: Backend: role/template mapping per team type
details: Support template mapping per role in TeamTypeRoleLink and expose CRUD for mapping in the API.

title: Backend: validate team members against role/template rules
details: Enforce that team member role_id is allowed for team_type and validate template assignment rules server-side.

title: Backend: expose role templates and defaults
details: Provide endpoints to read role default_template_id and team_type role template overrides for UI consumption.

title: Templates UI: add template type/usage guidance
details: Allow tagging templates for role/team usage and show where a template is referenced.

title: Add tests for team-role-template logic
details: Cover allowed/disallowed role assignment, template override validation, and UI read-only behavior for non-admins.

title: Add audit entries for team/role/template changes
details: Ensure create/update/delete actions for teams, roles, types, and templates are logged in audit log.

title: Team UI: surface active team and artifacts
details: Show active team, its members/roles, and linked artifacts from Scrum setup on dashboard or team detail.

title: Docs: update team/role/template permissions and usage
details: Document who can manage teams/roles/templates and how role-template mappings work.
